paragraphs.zh-tw: (Music) Dannielle Hadley: Lifein Pennsylvania means just that: life without the possibility of parole. For us lifers, as we call ourselves, our only chance for release is through commutation, which has only been grantedto two women since 1989, close to 30 years ago.
paragraphs.en: （音樂） Dannielle Hadley：在賓夕法尼亞州(監獄)的人生就意味著： 無法假釋的人生。 對我們這些「無期徒刑人」 這是我們對自己的叫法 我們獲釋的唯一機會 是減刑 可是，自1989年以來，只有兩名女性獲得減刑 那差不多是30年前的事

paragraphs.zh-tw: Our song, "This Is Not Our Home," it tells of our experiences while doing life withoutthe possibility of parole. (Music) Brenda Watkins: I'm a woman.
paragraphs.en: 我們以歌曲「這不是我們的家」 訴說我們的心聲， 一個無法假釋的人生。 （音樂） Brenda Watkins：我是一名女性

paragraphs.zh-tw: I'm a grandmother. I'm a daughter.
paragraphs.en: 我是一位祖母 我是一位女兒

paragraphs.zh-tw: I have a son. I'm not an angel.
paragraphs.en: 我有一個兒子 我不是天使

paragraphs.zh-tw: I'm not the devil. I came to jail when I was so young.
paragraphs.en: 我不是惡魔 我來到監獄時 還是那麼年輕

paragraphs.zh-tw: I spend my time here inside these prison walls. Lost friends to death, saw some go home.
paragraphs.en: 我的時間耗在這裡 在這監獄牆內 失去過一些朋友，她們在此過世 也看過一些朋友，她們最後回家

paragraphs.zh-tw: Watch years pass, people come and go, while I do life without parole. I am a prisonerfor the wrong I've done.
paragraphs.en: 眼看年華逝去 人來人往 而我在這裡過著假釋無望的人生 我是做過錯事的受刑人

paragraphs.zh-tw: I'm doing time here. This is not my home.
paragraphs.en: 我在這裡受刑 這裡不是我的家

paragraphs.zh-tw: Dream of freedom, hope for mercy. Will I see my family or die alone? As the years go by, I hold back my tears, because if I cry I'd give in to fear.
paragraphs.en: 夢想著自由，期待著慈悲 我會見到 我的家人 還是孤獨老死？ 年復一年 我止住了淚水 因為我一哭，就會向恐懼屈服

paragraphs.zh-tw: I must be strong, have to hold on. Gotta get through another year.
paragraphs.en: 我必須堅強，必須堅持 必須熬過 另一年

paragraphs.zh-tw: I am a prisonerfor the wrong I've done. I'm doing time here.This is not my home.
paragraphs.en: 我是做過錯事的受刑人 我在這裡受刑這裡不是我的家

paragraphs.zh-tw: Dream of freedom, hope for mercy. Will I see my family or die alone? I'm not saying that I'm not guilty, I'm not saying that I shouldn't pay.
paragraphs.en: 夢想著自由，期待著慈悲 我會見到 我的家人 還是孤獨老死？ 我不是說我沒罪 我不是說我無需付出代價

paragraphs.zh-tw: All I'm asking is for forgiveness. Gotta have hope I'll be free someday.
paragraphs.en: 我想要的只是原諒 必須抱著希望，某天我會重獲自由

paragraphs.zh-tw: Is there a place for me in the world out there? Will they ever know or carethat I'm chained? Is there redemption for the sinof my younger days? Because I've changed. Lord knows I've changed.
paragraphs.en: 是否有我容身之地 在外面世界某處？ 外面到底有沒有人知道、或關心我在此受刑？ 我年輕時所犯的罪孽能否一一償還？ 因為我已經變了 上天知道我已經變了

paragraphs.zh-tw: I am a prisonerfor the wrong I've done. I'm doing time here.This is not my home.
paragraphs.en: 我是做過錯事的受刑人 我在這裡受刑這裡不是我的家

paragraphs.zh-tw: Dream of freedom, hope for mercy. Will I see my family or die alone? Will I see my family or die alone? I'm known to you as Inmate 008106.
